personalInfo.name: MANDADI KARTHIKEYAN REDDY
personalInfo.title: Senior Software Engineer
personalInfo.summary: Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with {experience} years of experience in full-stack development, specializing in ASP.NET, React, and database migrations. Proven track record of delivering impactful features, increasing test coverage from 0% to 20%, and leading critical SQL to PostgreSQL and EDMX to CodeFirst migrations. Awarded Best Employee (Q3 2023) and Security Hackathon winner. Expert in TDD, Agile practices, and modern development workflows. Passionate about clean code, continuous improvement, and building scalable enterprise solutions.

items.position: Senior Software Engineer, Navex India Pvt ltd
responsibilities: Worked on SQL to PostgreSQL Migration.
Worked on EDMX to CodeFirst Migration, inorder to make the application feasible for Dotnet core migration.

items.position: Member of Technical Staff, First American India
responsibilities: Developed and enhanced several critical features for web applications using ASP.NET (C#).
Documented comprehensive database documentation to support development and maintenance.
Delivered multiple kaizens, driving continuous improvement and efficiency in processes.
Expertise in NUnit unit testing, increasing test coverage from 0% to 20%.
Leveraged SQL, JavaScript, and jQuery to create efficient and responsive solutions.
Actively participated in Agile ceremonies, refining requirements, and adapting Jira methodology for project tracking.
Recognized with the Best Employee Award (Q3 2023) for exceptional performance and contributions.

items.description: As an Electrical and Electronics Engineering (EEE) student with a 9.51 CGPA, I have built a strong academic and practical foundation. I have conducted research on CC-CV technology for Li-ion batteries to enhance charging efficiency and extend battery life. Additionally, I contributed to vehicle building as part of the Electrical Vehicle Club and secured 3rd place in the SAE: REEV competition organized by IEEE. My projects and research demonstrate my passion for sustainable energy solutions and advanced technologies in the electric vehicle sector.

During my intermediate studies in MPC (Mathematics, Physics, and Chemistry), I secured a CGPA of 9.71, which laid a strong foundation for my further academic and technical pursuits in the field of Electrical and Electronics Engineering
During my 10th Standard studies, I secured a CGPA of 9.7.
Won Security Hackathon Competition organized by First American. This Competition involves in finding security flaws in application as per OWASP and security good practices.
Won Best Employee Award for work in First American Organization.
Won 3rd Prize in Range Extended Electrical vehicle competition organized by IEEE SAE Bangalore division.
